original: @271a // gti mug mun pa bag chags bcas par gtan spangs nas //
analyzed: @271a // gti mug mun pa bag chags bcas par gtan spangs nas //
translated: Having completely abandoned the darkness of delusion and its habitual tendencies,

original: 'gro ba'i don du rten 'brel zab mo'i gsung sgrogs la //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don du rten 'brel zab mo'i gsung sgrogs la //
translated: and proclaimed the profound teachings on dependent origination for the benefit of beings,

original: rab tu dang ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: rab tu dang ba sngon du 'gro bas phyag 'tshal te //
translated: I pay homage with a mind of faith.

original: dang po'i las can gti mug shas che'i don du bshad //
analyzed: dang po'i las can gti mug shas che'i don du bshad //
translated: I will explain this for the benefit of those who are beginners and have a predominance of delusion.🔽The summary:🔽The signs, the benefits, what is to be understood,🔽the accumulations, meditation, determining the measure,

original: sdom ni / rtags dang phan yon shes bya dang // tshogs dang bsgom dang tshod gzung dang // skye rim gnas tshad brtan pa'i thabs //
analyzed: sdom ni / rtags dang phan yon shes bya dang // tshogs dang bsgom dang tshod gzung dang // skye rim gnas tshad brtan pa'i thabs //
translated: the stages of arising, the measure of stability,

original: log rtog spang dang bcu yin no //
analyzed: log rtog spang dang bcu yin no //
translated: the methods, and abandoning misconceptions.

original: de la gang zag gti mug spyad pa'i rtags rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gang zag gti mug spyad pa'i rtags rnams gang zhe na /
translated: What are the signs of a person who engages in delusion?

original: 'di ni gang zag gti mug spyad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ni gang zag gti mug spyad pa ni /
translated: This is for a person who engages in delusion.

original: rmongs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po chung ngu la yang gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa stug po dang / mang po skyed par byed na /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur ba'i dngos po chung ngu la yang gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa stug po dang / mang po skyed par byed na /
translated: If, with regard to things that cause confusion, even small ones, they generate a thick and abundant entanglement of delusion,

original: 'bring dang chen po dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos te gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa de yang yun ring du sems kyi rgyud la gnas @271b par byed cing /
analyzed: 'bring dang chen po dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos te gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa de yang yun ring du sems kyi rgyud la gnas @271b par byed cing /
translated: What need is there to mention the middling and great? That entanglement of delusion will remain in the mind-stream for a long time.🔽That entanglement of delusion will be related to for a long time.

original: gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa de yang yun ring du rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ba dang / de rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa de yang yun ring du rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ba dang / de rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur zhing /
translated: That person will be overcome by phenomena that cause delusion.🔽That person will be unable to overcome phenomena that cause delusion.

original: rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams zil gyis non par mi nus pa dang / dbang po rtul pa dang / dbang po blun pa dang / dbang po zhan pa dang / lus kyi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang / ngag gi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams zil gyis non par mi nus pa dang / dbang po rtul pa dang / dbang po blun pa dang / dbang po zhan pa dang / lus kyi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang / ngag gi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang /
translated: That person will have dull faculties, stupid faculties, weak faculties, lax physical actions, lax verbal actions,

original: nyes par bsams pa sems pa dang / nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang / nyes par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / le lo che ba dang / bsgrub mi phod pa dang / smra ba zhan pa dang / yid mi gzhungs pa dang /
analyzed: nyes par bsams pa sems pa dang / nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang / nyes par bya ba'i las byed pa dang / le lo che ba dang / bsgrub mi phod pa dang / smra ba zhan pa dang / yid mi gzhungs pa dang /
translated: They are: thinking badly, speaking badly, acting badly, being very lazy, being unable to accomplish anything, being timid, having a weak memory,

original: brjed ngas pa dang / shes bzhin du mi spyod pa dang / log par 'dzin pa dang / bral bar dka' ba dang / yid dbyung bar dka' ba dang / dman pa la mos pa dang / glen pa dang / dig pa dang / lkugs pa dang /
analyzed: brjed ngas pa dang / shes bzhin du mi spyod pa dang / log par 'dzin pa dang / bral bar dka' ba dang / yid dbyung bar dka' ba dang / dman pa la mos pa dang / glen pa dang / dig pa dang / lkugs pa dang /
translated: being forgetful, not being mindful, holding wrong views, being difficult to separate from, being difficult to discourage, having a lowly aspiration, being stupid, being mute, being dumb,

original: lag pas brda byed pa dang / legs par gsungs pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par mi nus pa dang / rkyen gyis phrogs pa dang / gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa yin te /
analyzed: lag pas brda byed pa dang / legs par gsungs pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par mi nus pa dang / rkyen gyis phrogs pa dang / gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa yin te /
translated: being a manual laborer, being unable to understand the meaning of the Dharma, whether it is well spoken or badly spoken, being carried away by circumstances, and being dependent on others.

original: de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ni gang zag gti mug spyad pa'i rtags rnams yin par rig par bya'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ni gang zag gti mug spyad pa'i rtags rnams yin par rig par bya'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: These and other similar qualities should be understood as the signs of a deluded person.

original: de la phan yon ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la goms na ma rig pa spong zhing yang dag pa'i lta ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la phan yon ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la goms na ma rig pa spong zhing yang dag pa'i lta ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The benefit is that when one is accustomed to dependent origination, ignorance is eliminated and the correct view arises.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As is said:

original: gang dag dngos rnams brten byas nas //
analyzed: gang dag dngos rnams brten byas nas //
translated: Those who assert that things are not real,

original: chu yi zla ba lta bur ni //🔽yang dag ma yin log min par //
analyzed: chu yi zla ba lta bur ni // yang dag ma yin log min par //
translated: Like the moon in water,

original: 'dod pa de dag ltas mi phrogs //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa de dag ltas mi phrogs // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Are not carried away by views.

original: de la shes par bya ba ni mdor bsdu na bzhi ste grangs dang / ngo bo dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / de gang gis bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de la shes par bya ba ni mdor bsdu na bzhi ste grangs dang / ngo bo dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / de gang gis bsdu ba'o //
translated: The object of knowledge is, in brief, fourfold: number, nature, etymology, and what it subsumes.

original: de la grangs ni bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: de la grangs ni bcu gnyis te /
translated: The number is twelve:

original: ma rig pa dang / ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang /
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed dang / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs dang / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang / skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang /
translated: Ignorance, the condition of ignorance is formation, the condition of formation is consciousness, the condition of consciousness is name and form, the condition of name and form is the six sense sources, the condition of the six sense sources is contact,

original: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang / @272a * //
analyzed: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang / len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang / @272a * //
translated: Contact is the condition for feeling. Feeling is the condition for craving. Craving is the condition for grasping. Grasping is the condition for becoming.

original: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang / skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'o //
translated: Becoming is the condition for birth. Birth is the condition for old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, dejection, and anguish.

original: ma rig pa'i ngo bo ni khams drug po 'di dag nyid la gang gcig bur 'dzin pa dang / ril por 'du shes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽de ltar ma rig pa yod pas yul rnams la /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i ngo bo ni khams drug po 'di dag nyid la gang gcig bur 'dzin pa dang / ril por 'du shes pa la sogs pa'o // de ltar ma rig pa yod pas yul rnams la /
translated: The nature of ignorance is the grasping of the six elements as a single thing, as a whole, and so on.

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug 'jug ste /🔽de la yul rnams la /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug 'jug ste / de la yul rnams la /
translated: Thus, because of the existence of ignorance, there is the engagement of desire, hatred, and delusion with regard to objects.

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: Among them, desire, hatred, and delusion with regard to objects

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o //
translated: is called “the formations with ignorance as a condition.”

original: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni /
translated: The individual cognition of things🔽is called “consciousness with the formations as a condition.”

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni ming dang gzugs so //
translated: The four aggregates that arise together with consciousness and are appropriated are called name-and-form.

original: ming dang gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go //
translated: The faculties that are based on name-and-form are the six sense bases.

original: chos gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: chos gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o //
translated: The coming together of the three is contact.

original: reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o //
analyzed: reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o //
translated: The experience of contact is feeling.

original: tshor ba la zhen pa ni /
analyzed: tshor ba la zhen pa ni /
translated: Clinging to feeling is craving.

original: sred pa'o // sred pa la 'phel ba ni len pa'o //
analyzed: sred pa'o // sred pa la 'phel ba ni len pa'o //
translated: The increase of craving is grasping.

original: len pa skyes pa yang srid pa skyed pa'i las ni srid pa'o //
analyzed: len pa skyes pa yang srid pa skyed pa'i las ni srid pa'o //
translated: The action that produces the existence of grasping is becoming.

original: rgyu de las phung po 'byung ba ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu de las phung po 'byung ba ni skye ba'o //
translated: The arising of the aggregates from that cause is birth.

original: skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o //
analyzed: skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o //
translated: The ripening of the aggregates after birth is aging.

original: rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o //
translated: The destruction of the aggregates after aging is death.

original: 'chi zhing myos te /
analyzed: 'chi zhing myos te /
translated: Death is confusion.

original: mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan no //
analyzed: mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan no //
translated: The inner burning of one who is attached is sorrow.

original: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu smra ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu smra ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o //
translated: Speech that arises from sorrow is lamentation.

original: rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i yid mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo //🔽yid la byed pa dang ldan pa ni yid kyi sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i yid mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo // yid la byed pa dang ldan pa ni yid kyi sdug bsngal lo //
translated: The mental faculty associated with the five collections of consciousness and the experience of displeasure is suffering.🔽The mental faculty associated with attention is mental suffering.

original: yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid mi bde ba'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid mi bde ba'o //
translated: The mental suffering associated with the mental faculty is displeasure.

original: gzhan yang 'di lta bu la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di lta bu la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Moreover, all such secondary mental afflictions are called disturbances.

original: nges pa'i tshig ni mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig ni mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o //
translated: The verbal definition is that ignorance is so called because it is a great darkness.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so //
translated: Formations are so called because they form.

original: rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is so called because it cognizes.

original: brten pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: brten pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs so //
translated: Name and form are so called because they are based.

original: skye ba'i sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go //
analyzed: skye ba'i sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go //
translated: The six sense bases are so called because they are the doors of birth.

original: reg pa'i phyir reg pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa'i phyir reg pa'o //
translated: Contact is so called because it contacts.

original: myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o //
analyzed: myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o //
translated: Sensation is so called because it is experienced.

original: skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o //
analyzed: skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o //
translated: Craving is so called because it thirsts.

original: nye bar len pa'i phyir nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phyir nye bar len pa'o //
translated: Grasping is so called because it grasps.

original: yang srid pa skyed pa'i phyir srid pa'o //
analyzed: yang srid pa skyed pa'i phyir srid pa'o //
translated: “Becoming” is so called because it brings about rebirth.

original: phung po 'byung @272b ba'i phyir skye ba'o //🔽phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o //🔽'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: phung po 'byung @272b ba'i phyir skye ba'o // phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o // 'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o //
translated: “Birth” is so called because it is the origin of the aggregates.🔽“Aging” is so called because it is the ripening of the aggregates.

original: mya ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan no //
analyzed: mya ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan no //
translated: “Death” is so called because it is the destruction of the aggregates.🔽“Sorrow” is so called because it is the cause of grief.

original: tshig gi smre ba'i phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gi smre ba'i phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o //
translated: “Crying” is so called because it is the cause of lamentation.

original: lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: “Suffering” is so called because it is the cause of physical pain.

original: sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o //
analyzed: sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o //
translated: “Despair” is so called because it is the cause of mental pain.

original: nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrugs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrugs pa'o //
translated: “Disturbance” is so called because it is the cause of affliction.

original: de gang gis bsdus she na /
analyzed: de gang gis bsdus she na /
translated: By what are these included?

original: gsum po 'di dag gis bsdus te /
analyzed: gsum po 'di dag gis bsdus te /
translated: They are included in three:

original: nyon mongs pa dang las dang sdug bsngal lo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang las dang sdug bsngal lo //
translated: afflictions, actions, and suffering.

original: de la tshogs ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la sogs pa gzhan du blta'o //
analyzed: de la tshogs ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la sogs pa gzhan du blta'o //
translated: The collection should be understood elsewhere as pure morality, etc.

original: 'dir bye brag cung zad tsam zhig bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir bye brag cung zad tsam zhig bsam par bya ste /
translated: Here, only a few distinctions should be considered.

original: gti mug 'dis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba'i thabs mi shes shing mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gti mug 'dis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba'i thabs mi shes shing mi mthong ste /
translated: This ignorance does not understand and does not see the means of transcending the world.

original: des na ngan 'gro 'ba' zhig tu lhung na byang chub lta ga la 'thob /
analyzed: des na ngan 'gro 'ba' zhig tu lhung na byang chub lta ga la 'thob /
translated: Therefore, if one falls into the unfortunate realms, how can one attain enlightenment?

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rmongs pas chos rnams mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rmongs pas chos rnams mi mthong ngo //
translated: The ignorant do not see the Dharma.

original: gang dag gti mug rten byed pa //
analyzed: gang dag gti mug rten byed pa //
translated: Those who make ignorance their basis

original: de dag ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs so ;
analyzed: de dag ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur // zhes gsungs so ;
translated: will go to the unfortunate realms.

original: / de bas na bdag gis gti mug sbyang ba'i ched du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gus par bsgom mo snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: / de bas na bdag gis gti mug sbyang ba'i ched du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la gus par bsgom mo snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should arouse the mind that thinks, “I will respectfully cultivate the dependent origination in order to purify ignorance.”

original: de la bsgom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bsgom pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is cultivation?

original: thog mar bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas la stan bde ba'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas lus drang por bsrangs la ;
analyzed: thog mar bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas la stan bde ba'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas lus drang por bsrangs la ;
translated: First, having completed all activities, one should sit cross-legged on a comfortable seat, straighten the body,

original: yid tsam zhig bsdad do //
analyzed: yid tsam zhig bsdad do //
translated: and sit for a while.

original: de nas 'di snyam du rten 'brel ni ma rig pa nas 'khrug pa'i bar 'di las med par gsungs pas 'di nyid ci gsal du bsgom mo snyam du bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas 'di snyam du rten 'brel ni ma rig pa nas 'khrug pa'i bar 'di las med par gsungs pas 'di nyid ci gsal du bsgom mo snyam du bsam mo //
translated: Then, one should think, “Since it is said that dependent origination is nothing but this, from ignorance up to aging and death, I will cultivate this very thing until it becomes clear.”

original: de nas rim gyis bgrang zhing grangs mi brjod pa go rims ma 'khrugs par sgra spyi dang / don spyi'i rnam pa yid kyi brjod pa de la shes pa shin tu bsgrims la rab tu gsal bar gtad do //
analyzed: de nas rim gyis bgrang zhing grangs mi brjod pa go rims ma 'khrugs par sgra spyi dang / don spyi'i rnam pa yid kyi brjod pa de la shes pa shin tu bsgrims la rab tu gsal bar gtad do //
translated: Then, gradually counting, without reciting the number, in the order of the general sound and the general meaning, the mental expression, the consciousness is very focused on that, and is directed with great clarity.

original: khams kyi tshod gzung ba ni spyir khams rab 'bring gsum yod kyang dge sbyong gzhan la rab tu 'jug la bsgom pa la zhan pa yang snang bas khams rab kyis kyang thun thung ngu nas bslabs na legs so //
analyzed: khams kyi tshod gzung ba ni spyir khams rab 'bring gsum yod kyang dge sbyong gzhan la rab tu 'jug la bsgom pa la zhan pa yang snang bas khams rab kyis kyang thun thung ngu nas bslabs na legs so //
translated: As for the measure of the constituent element, in general, there are three: best, medium, and low. However, since it appears that the other spiritual practitioners engage in the best, but are weak in meditation, it is good if those of the best constituent element train in short sessions.

original: de bas na gsum kas kyang dang po nas slob lugs gcig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na gsum kas kyang dang po nas slob lugs gcig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, all three should train in the same way from the beginning.

original: mtshan mo btang snyoms su bzhag ste /
analyzed: mtshan mo btang snyoms su bzhag ste /
translated: At night, rest in equanimity.

original: gnyid ji tsam log pa de tsam gyis khams brtas pa de tsam log cing gdal lo //
analyzed: gnyid ji tsam log pa de tsam gyis khams brtas pa de tsam log cing gdal lo //
translated: To the extent that one falls asleep, to that extent the constituent element increases, falls, and spreads.

original: nyin par zhar la tshod bzung zhing bsgom mo //
analyzed: nyin par zhar la tshod bzung zhing bsgom mo //
translated: During the day, take the measure and meditate.

original: ji ltar dang po'i nyin par snga dro'i @273a * //
analyzed: ji ltar dang po'i nyin par snga dro'i @273a * //
translated: As for the first day, in the morning,

original: thun gcig la yun gom pa tha mal ba'i mda' rgyang phyed du phyin pa tsam zhig bsgom mo //
analyzed: thun gcig la yun gom pa tha mal ba'i mda' rgyang phyed du phyin pa tsam zhig bsgom mo //
translated: In one session, meditate for the length of time it takes to walk half a krosa at a normal pace.

original: phyi dro thun gcig la yang de bzhin du bsgom mo //
analyzed: phyi dro thun gcig la yang de bzhin du bsgom mo //
translated: In the evening, meditate in one session in the same way.

original: de nas nyi ma bcu'i bar du nyi ma re re la thun re bsnan zhing bsgom mo //
analyzed: de nas nyi ma bcu'i bar du nyi ma re re la thun re bsnan zhing bsgom mo //
translated: Then, for ten days, meditate, increasing the length of each session by one session each day.

original: na tsha phran tshegs byung na thun gyi grangs da bri ba dang ; thabs gzhan gyis kyang rung ste /
analyzed: na tsha phran tshegs byung na thun gyi grangs da bri ba dang ; thabs gzhan gyis kyang rung ste /
translated: If minor pain occurs, reduce the number of sessions and use other methods.

original: 'phral la zhi bar bya /
analyzed: 'phral la zhi bar bya /
translated: Immediately, pacify it.

original: bsran bskyed cing mi bsgom mo //
analyzed: bsran bskyed cing mi bsgom mo //
translated: Do not meditate while generating endurance.

original: na tsha med na gong du bstan pa bzhin du bsgom mo //
analyzed: na tsha med na gong du bstan pa bzhin du bsgom mo //
translated: If there is no pain, meditate as explained above.

original: de ltar na khams kyi tshod zhar la shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na khams kyi tshod zhar la shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, you will know the measure of your elements.

original: de la sems kyi skye ba'i rim pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la sems kyi skye ba'i rim pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: There are four stages in the development of the mind:

original: dang po ni rab tu bsgrims kyang grangs brjed cing 'gro //
analyzed: dang po ni rab tu bsgrims kyang grangs brjed cing 'gro //
translated: In the first, you forget the count even though you are concentrating,

original: go rims kyang 'khrugs shing 'gro ba dang / gnyis pa ni grangs mi brjed la go rims kyang 'khrugs pa med par 'jug go //
analyzed: go rims kyang 'khrugs shing 'gro ba dang / gnyis pa ni grangs mi brjed la go rims kyang 'khrugs pa med par 'jug go //
translated: and the order becomes confused. In the second, you do not forget the count, and the order is not confused.

original: gsum pa ni grangs dang go rims mi 'khrugs shing rten 'brel gzugs can gang dag yin pa de dag phal cher snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsum pa ni grangs dang go rims mi 'khrugs shing rten 'brel gzugs can gang dag yin pa de dag phal cher snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The third is that the number and sequence are not disturbed, and that the physical dependent originations appear for the most part.

original: bzhi pa ni gzugs can rnams gsal bar rtsol ba drag zhan gnyis ka la snang ba dang / gzugs can ma yin pa yang shin tu nges pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni gzugs can rnams gsal bar rtsol ba drag zhan gnyis ka la snang ba dang / gzugs can ma yin pa yang shin tu nges pa'o //
translated: The fourth is that the physical ones appear in both strong and weak ways, and the non-physical ones are very certain.

original: gang la gtad kyang bde zhing 'og mar 'phor mi 'dod pa snyam byed cing bde ba dang sems kyi dga' ba dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la gtad kyang bde zhing 'og mar 'phor mi 'dod pa snyam byed cing bde ba dang sems kyi dga' ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Wherever it is directed, it is blissful and one feels no desire to move it downward. It is endowed with bliss and mental joy.

original: de la ji tsam gyis na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sems gnas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji tsam gyis na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sems gnas pa yin zhe na /
translated: How long does it take to stabilize the mind on dependent origination?

original: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pa des rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la kun tu bsten cing goms par byas //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnal 'byor pa des rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la kun tu bsten cing goms par byas //
translated: In this way, the yogi/nī relies on and becomes familiar with dependent origination.

original: lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus /
analyzed: lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus /
translated: By the cause of doing it many times,

original: rgyu yang rung gnas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: rgyu yang rung gnas kyang rung ste /
translated: whether in a place with causes or a place without causes,

original: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par ches mang du snang la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par ches mang du snang la /
translated: the frequent appearance of impermanence, suffering, emptiness, and selflessness;🔽the non-appearance of permanence, happiness, and the view of the transitory aggregates;

original: rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa med pa dang / kun tu rmongs par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma dang / kun tu rmongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la sems mi 'jug pa yin no //🔽de la brten pa'i thabs ni sems gnas par shes nas sngar bsgoms pa bas thun gyi grangs nyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang ldan pa med pa dang / kun tu rmongs par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma dang / kun tu rmongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i chos rnams la sems mi 'jug pa yin no // de la brten pa'i thabs ni sems gnas par shes nas sngar bsgoms pa bas thun gyi grangs nyung bar bya ste /
translated: and the non-engagement of the mind in the signs of confusion and in phenomena that are conducive to confusion.

original: yun cung zad ring bar bsgom mo //
analyzed: yun cung zad ring bar bsgom mo //
translated: The method for stabilizing it is as follows: When you know that the mind is stable, reduce the number of meditation sessions but increase their length.

original: srod dang tho rangs la yang bsgom mo //
analyzed: srod dang tho rangs la yang bsgom mo //
translated: Meditate in the evening and at dawn.

original: sngar ji tsam gsal ba de tsam las rtsol bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sngar ji tsam gsal ba de tsam las rtsol bar mi bya'o //
translated: Do not exert yourself beyond the clarity that you had before.

original: bye brag ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: bye brag ni 'di yin te /
translated: The difference is as follows.

original: skye ba snga ma'i ma rig pa las 'du byed 'byung bas de gnyis kyis skye ba 'di'i mang la du @273b rnam par shes bzhugs nas srid pa'i bar du skye ba 'di dang len pa nas srid pa'i bar du ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu byas shing /
analyzed: skye ba snga ma'i ma rig pa las 'du byed 'byung bas de gnyis kyis skye ba 'di'i mang la du @273b rnam par shes bzhugs nas srid pa'i bar du skye ba 'di dang len pa nas srid pa'i bar du ma 'ongs pa'i rgyu byas shing /
translated: From the link of name and form up to the link of birth in this life, the link of becoming creates the cause for the future.

original: de ma 'ongs pa nas dang po mngal du 'jug pa ni skye ba'o //
analyzed: de ma 'ongs pa nas dang po mngal du 'jug pa ni skye ba'o //
translated: From that future up to first entering the womb is birth.

original: de rga ba la sogs pa rim gyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: de rga ba la sogs pa rim gyis 'byung ste /
translated: That is aging and so on, which occur in sequence.

original: des yang ma rig pa dang 'du byed 'byung ste /
analyzed: des yang ma rig pa dang 'du byed 'byung ste /
translated: That creates ignorance and formations.

original: de yang ma 'ongs pa na nying mtshams sbyor ro //
analyzed: de yang ma 'ongs pa na nying mtshams sbyor ro //
translated: That also connects to the future.

original: des rgyun mi chad par rlung gi rgyun bzhin du 'jug go snyam du bsam mo //
analyzed: des rgyun mi chad par rlung gi rgyun bzhin du 'jug go snyam du bsam mo //
translated: Think that it occurs without interruption, like the flow of a river.

original: ji srid du lus ngal ba 'am /
analyzed: ji srid du lus ngal ba 'am /
translated: As long as the body is not tired,

original: sems dub pa 'am /
analyzed: sems dub pa 'am /
translated: the mind is not weary,

original: bsgom tsam na dngang ba 'am /🔽shugs 'byung ba 'am /
analyzed: bsgom tsam na dngang ba 'am / shugs 'byung ba 'am /
translated: or the meditation is not frightening,🔽or the breath is not forceful,🔽or the head is not heavy,🔽or the body is not shaking,

original: mgo bags kyis lci ba 'am /
analyzed: mgo bags kyis lci ba 'am /
translated: or trembling,🔽or the sleep at night is light,🔽or the food is not unappetizing,🔽or the body is not hot,🔽or the mind is not distracted,

original: yam yom byed pa 'am /
analyzed: yam yom byed pa 'am /
translated: or the body is not cold,🔽or the mind is not dull,🔽or the body is not itchy,🔽or the mind is not agitated,🔽or the body is not painful,🔽or the mind is not confused,🔽or the body is not swollen,🔽or the mind is not depressed,🔽or the body is not emaciated,🔽or the mind is not elated,🔽or the body is not weak,🔽or the mind is not distracted,

original: 'dar ba 'am /
analyzed: 'dar ba 'am /
translated: or the body is not heavy,🔽or the mind is not scattered,

original: nub mo gnyid srab pa 'am /
analyzed: nub mo gnyid srab pa 'am /
translated: or the body is not sluggish,🔽or the mind is not agitated,🔽or the body is not agitated,🔽or the mind is not distracted,

original: zas mi zhim pa 'am /
analyzed: zas mi zhim pa 'am /
translated: or the body is not dull,🔽or the mind is not confused,🔽or the body is not confused,🔽or the mind is not depressed,🔽or the body is not depressed,🔽or the mind is not elated,🔽or the body is not elated,🔽or the mind is not distracted,🔽or the body is not distracted,🔽or the mind is not scattered,🔽or the body is not scattered,🔽or the mind is not agitated,🔽or the body is not agitated,🔽or the mind is not confused,🔽or the body is not confused,🔽or the mind is not depressed,🔽or the body is not depressed,🔽or the mind is not elated,🔽or the body is not elated,🔽or the mind is not distracted,🔽or the body is not distracted

original: ngag gi 'khrul pa mang du 'byung ba la sogs pa khams mi bde ba'i mtshan ma cung zad ma byung gi bar du bsgom mo //
analyzed: ngag gi 'khrul pa mang du 'byung ba la sogs pa khams mi bde ba'i mtshan ma cung zad ma byung gi bar du bsgom mo //
translated: Meditate until you experience any of the signs of an unhealthy body, such as a lot of verbal errors.

original: de nam byung na ngal bso ste /
analyzed: de nam byung na ngal bso ste /
translated: When that happens, take a break.

original: lus la bsku mnye bya /
analyzed: lus la bsku mnye bya /
translated: Massage your body.

original: chos dang mthun pa'i zas skom kyis lus dub pa brtas su gzhug ste /🔽khams sor ma chud kyi bar du nyin mtshan gnyis la nam bsgom snying 'dod pa'i dus su /
analyzed: chos dang mthun pa'i zas skom kyis lus dub pa brtas su gzhug ste / khams sor ma chud kyi bar du nyin mtshan gnyis la nam bsgom snying 'dod pa'i dus su /
translated: Restore your body’s strength with food and drink that are in keeping with the Dharma.

original: thun chung ngu re re lta ba tsam bsgom mo //
analyzed: thun chung ngu re re lta ba tsam bsgom mo //
translated: Until your health is restored, meditate only when you feel like meditating, in short sessions, day and night.

original: nus pa brtas nas srod tho rangs thun re mi chags par bsgom /
analyzed: nus pa brtas nas srod tho rangs thun re mi chags par bsgom /
translated: When your strength is restored, meditate without a break in the evening and at dawn.

original: nyin par thun gsum gsum du bsgom zhing snying rje sngon du 'gro ba dang / smon lam la sogs pa yang bya'o ;🔽/ de la log par rtog pa spang ba gang zhe na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyin par thun gsum gsum du bsgom zhing snying rje sngon du 'gro ba dang / smon lam la sogs pa yang bya'o ; / de la log par rtog pa spang ba gang zhe na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Meditate in three sessions during the day, and make prayers of aspiration and so on, preceded by compassion.🔽How do you eliminate misconceptions?

original: rang bzhin yod par rtog pa ni log par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin yod par rtog pa ni log par rtogs pa'o //
translated: It is a misconception to think that things exist by their intrinsic nature, because they arise in dependence.

original: de skad du 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis kyang /
analyzed: de skad du 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis kyang /
translated: Thus, the noble Nagarjuna also says:🔽All who speak of impermanence

original: sangs rgyas lam la brten nas ni //🔽thams cad mi rtag smra ba rnams //🔽rtsod pa yis ni dngos po la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lam la brten nas ni // thams cad mi rtag smra ba rnams // rtsod pa yis ni dngos po la //
translated: Rely on the path of the Buddha.🔽Those who are attached to things

original: chags gnas gang yin de smad do //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: chags gnas gang yin de smad do // zhes gsungs so //
translated: By means of dispute are to be despised.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lam mo //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi lam mo //
translated: Dependent origination is the path of the Buddha.

original: de bas na dngos po thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir don dam par rang bzhin med de dper na sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na dngos po thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir don dam par rang bzhin med de dper na sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should follow the statement that all things are essenceless ultimately because they are dependently arisen, like a magician's illusion.

original: las tshul bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //
analyzed: las tshul bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //
translated: Although the ways of karma are inconceivable,

original: bdag pas blo zhan mi srid de //
analyzed: bdag pas blo zhan mi srid de //
translated: It is not possible that I am less intelligent than the masters.

original: 'on kyang don du mi gnyer bas //
analyzed: 'on kyang don du mi gnyer bas //
translated: Nevertheless, because I do not strive for the goal,

original: mkhas pa'i gdams ngag ma thos la //
analyzed: mkhas pa'i gdams ngag ma thos la //
translated: I have not heard the instructions of the wise.

original: phan srid bsams nas bris pa lags //
analyzed: phan srid bsams nas bris pa lags //
translated: Thinking that it might be helpful, I have written this.🔽As if I were showing something to others

original: rab rib can gyis gzugs bltas nas //🔽gzhan la 'di zhes ston 'dra bas //🔽mkhas pa rnams la @274a * //
analyzed: rab rib can gyis gzugs bltas nas // gzhan la 'di zhes ston 'dra bas // mkhas pa rnams la @274a * //
translated: After seeing a form with blurred vision,

original: bzod par gsol //
analyzed: bzod par gsol //
translated: I ask the wise to forgive me.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bgrang ba'i sgo nas sems gnas par bya ba'i thabs cung zad bris pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bgrang ba'i sgo nas sems gnas par bya ba'i thabs cung zad bris pa rdzogs so//
translated: This concludes the brief explanation of the method for resting the mind by means of counting the dependently arisen connections.
